mapper.select: select t.id as topic_id, t.title, t.content, t.create_time, t.update_time, u.id as author_user_id, u.name as author_name, u.telephone author_telephone, u.sex author_sex, u.avatar author_avatar, u.signature author_signature, (select count(*) from comment c where c.topic_id=t.id) as comment_count, (select count(*) from topic_like tl where tl.topic_id=t.id)as like_count, t.user_id=#{userId} as mine, (select count(*) from topic_like tl where tl.topic_id=t.id and tl.user_id=#{userId})=#{userId} as `like` from topic t inner join user u on t.user_id = u.id where t.type=#{topicType} order by t.update_time desc

select t.id as topic_id, t.title, t.content, t.create_time, t.update_time, (select count(*) from comment c where c.topic_id=t.id) as comment_count, (select count(*) from topic_like tl where tl.topic_id=t.id)as like_count, (select count(*) from topic_like tl where tl.topic_id=t.id and tl.user_id=#{userId})=#{userId} as `like` from topic t where t.type=0 and t.user_id=#{userId} order by t.update_time desc
